With a background in Programming and Communication, a year of experience in tech consulting and development, plus three years of freelance work, I’ve developed websites, online stores, and apps using various frameworks, platforms, and libraries, and I've managed technical setups for digital marketing campaigns.

Originally from Mexico City, I am fluent in English, Spanish, and Italian. Outside of work, I enjoy singing, volunteering, and taking long walks with my dog, Ofelia.
